document.heading: SeVerna, LLC, Real Property Tax Exemption and Real Property Tax Relief Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-209, the “SeVerna, LLC, Real Property Tax Exemption and Real Property Tax Relief Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-589. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 28, 2014, and Nov. 18, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 10, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-512 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-209 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
